title: 06/29/21 DPS Hour 3 Marc Silverman
itunes:title: 06/29/21 DPS Hour 3 Marc Silverman
description:
Marc Silverman tells Dan that he has always defended Scottie Pippen and now he feels heart broken by all the Scottie comments lately. He says that Scottie is selling bourbon and books but is sad that Scottie is burning bridges.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Marc Silverman tells Dan that he has always defended Scottie Pippen and now he feels heart broken by all the Scottie comments lately. He says that Scottie is selling bourbon and books but is sad that Scottie is burning bridges.
